DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study establish safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics multiple dos MYK-461 human subject . This randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , sequential group , multiple ascending ( oral tablet ) dose study healthy volunteer age 18-55 year .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Multiple Ascending Oral Doses MYK-461 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Normal body mass index ( BMI ) Normal LVEF Normal electrocardiogram ( ECG ) Females must non pregnant , non lactating , sexually active , use acceptable birth control method time first dose 3 month last dose study drug Any structural abnormality echocardiography Positive result HIV test and/or seropositive HCV HBV
